subject: Saff on summer leave...
msgSnippet: Hi, all. Just so you know, I ll be on parental leave, and much more out of touch than usual, for the first half of summer 2012.  Over the last few months, I ve
messageBody:
Hi, all.

Just so you know, I'll be on parental leave, and much more out of touch
than usual, for the first half of summer 2012. Over the last few months,
I've appreciated a couple of community members stepping up so that this
isn't a one-man show, and I'll keep an eye out for anything urgent, but if
you notice things piling up a bit more than usual, don't panic.

Have a great summer,

David Saff


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
